emr_vis_nlp.view.doc_grid

Class DocumentGrid

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • prefuse.Display
            • emr_vis_nlp.view.doc_grid.DocumentGrid
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable

    public class DocumentGrid
extends prefuse.Display
    2d grid-based layout for documents; user selects attributes for X and Y axes, documents arranged according to values for these attributes. Optionally, user also selects additional auxiliary attributes and/or attribute values for display, represented as glyphs / color stripes / etc. Loosely based (in part) on "DataMountain" example in the Prefuse toolkit.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
